title: Dynamic Template Variables Update
author: Claude Code
description: Enhanced template with dynamic variables for HVAC, utilities, deposit, and updated terminology

items: Removed 'Mini-Split' references, replaced with dynamic {{HVAC_SYSTEM}} variable
Changed 'concept to completion' to 'start to finish' in project overview
Changed 'Interior Design' to 'ADU Plan Design¹' with footnote reference
Removed bullet point (•) from 'Appliances included' line item
{{HVAC_SYSTEM}} - Dynamic HVAC system type based on form selection
{{UTILITY_CONNECTIONS}} - Dynamic utility connections based on form selections
Removed R-13/R-30 specifications from insulation package
Made utility connections dynamic instead of hardcoded
Added project deposit line to pricing table with 'D' identifier
Added deposit row to pricing table before Phase 1
Updated footnote section with ADU Plan Design clarification
Maintained all v1.0 timeline enhancements and styling

technical_notes: All v1.0 timeline features preserved (120px connecting line, centered vertical line)
9px body text and consistent typography maintained
Form integration requires updates to pass new variables
Default values should be: DEPOSIT_AMOUNT=$1000, HVAC_SYSTEM='HVAC system'
deployment_requirements: Update form processing to collect HVAC system selection
Update form processing to collect utility preferences
Update pricing engine to include deposit calculations
Update PDF generation to pass all new variables
backwards_compatibility: Partial - new variables need default values
testing_checklist: Verify all new variables render correctly in PDF
Test deposit amount displays in pricing table
Check extra bathroom and driveway costs from form
